txt.en:
After encountering the elusive great-bat, Muzbuk, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

As you inspect Muzbuk's wings, you take care to avoid the sharp talons at the end of each of the great-bat's fingers. Could this be one of Azog's bat-sires of Moria?

You decide to bring this trophy to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim, that it might be preserved once the war is ended.
Deliver Muzbuk's wings to Elgur at Amdân

Elgur can be found at Amdân during the Battle of Azanulbizar in T.A. 2799.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe at Azanulbizar. You should deliver it to Elgur, a skilled taxidermist of the Landorrim.
After encountering the elusive great-bat, Muzbuk, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Haban'akkâ of Thráin.

'What have you brought me now?'

Elgur inspects Muzbuk's wings closely, holding them up to the faint sunlight at Azanulbizar.

'Ah, these shall make a fine trophy! When the war is ended, I shall mount these upon a fine plaque for you. Let us hope fewer of Azog's bats shall trouble us in the days to come!'
